text:
Not Sure i’ll get many responses as it’s a bit niche, but basically I have 2 HTML fields (type: “html” in the module fields.json)

In one module the file lets me add a lottie json file that I serve from the theme dev files
```<lottie-player class="lottie-animation" src="{{ get_asset_url('/my-theme-name/js/lottie-files/spinny-dots.json') }}" background="transparent"  speed="1"  style="width: 100%; height: 100%;"    autoplay></lottie-player>```
In the other module I have virtually identical code in the html field:
```<lottie-player class="desktop-only" src="{{ get_asset_url('/my-theme-name/js/lottie-files/jumpstart.json') }}" background="transparent"  speed="1"  style="width: 100%; height: 100%;" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice"></lottie-player>```
However in when I try to publish the page I get an error for the second one but not the first one. The error says hubl isn’t allowed in the HTML field although it works perfectly well in the first one, and works when I preview the page.

The main reason I want to serve it from the theme is that it get’s gzipped for page speed performance.

Does anyone have any ideas?

Hello,

Is there any way to get the list of submissions for a specific form, from HubSpot, in PHP/WordPress?
We have changed our business name and therefor our domain name. Should I run into any trouble renaming the businessname and domeinname in HubSpot ?
Have you verified if this will automatically create redirects? if not, you would need to import redirects for all of your current pages to the new domain or it would impact your seo
yes. We will be fine on that part. I wonder if we run into HubSpot native problems if we're gonna change the company name en domain

Hi everyone, I embedded a HubSpot form on my webpage but the form is very long, so when you get to the bottom and press Submit, you have to scroll all the way up to find the confirmation/success message. Is there any workaround for this? Maybe a way to show the confirmation message at the bottom of the form instead of the top?
I don't think this is currently possible, please don't post the same question in every channel, it is very annoying
okay sir
sorry sir

You're good man, usually most people watch multiple channels so like for this question, I would just post it in the javascript channel and then if no one responses you can post it in the general channel
ok thanks

Have you tried getting the assets URLs within the module's HubL, set them to HubL variables, then apply the HubL variables to src of each custom HTML element with javascript within a {% require_js %} block?

I ended up sticking them in the file manager instead and just using the url from there, not the best solution seems to still at least gzip them, lottie didn’t gzip them when they host them which seems bizaar
Anyone else getting intermittent 530 errors on their production site? Sometimes it's just assets (hubfs) but also full pages not loading
Yes <@U03K7DAL09L> it seems down for sometime. Now it’s working on multiple hard refresh.
Just happened to one of my sites
Big problem
Style Sheets weren't loading
Cloudflare seems to be having an outage
Confirmed by support as well - thanks team :slightly_smiling_face:

Would anyone know how to go about adding a icon image to a Advanced Menu item? I have tried HTML and even tried to see if I can add a css class to the item but it all renders out as text, I want an icon to appear after the text label

Thank you for the reply. This isnt working for me, i think it may be a problem with the template im using. What i would like to know if there is a way to filter what the function standard_header_includes is returning. I know that every time is called is writing the tags or html that has configured, but where? i would like to edit or filter this function somehow
is there a way to set a default featured image for all posts and pages somewhere? for sharing purposes?
<@U03K7DAL09L> Did support team told you ETA of fixing the issue?
yea i have the same problema maybe in a few hours its fixed
Still I’m facing same issues. It’s not fixed yet by support team.
Hi I deleted user from our HubSpot that was connected to developer account. And now we can't access the app and the dev account
Is there anything that I can do?
What is strange that we are still able to connect to app shell
So it looks like the APP still exists just no one have access to it

They did not! I was told I would receive an email once their internal team had resolved the issue

Another user suggested this is a Cloudflare outage
thanks <@U01QVR44MEY> - it still feels a little unclear as to whether or not there is a total file storage limit or just a limit on individual files.
Seems to be working again!

Hello everyone :wave: not sure if this is the right channel for this question. On HubSpot blog, I would like to assign a different image for open graph than the featured image. I tried adding it in the “Advanced options > additional code snippets” but it’s still not working. Has anyone done this successfully?
```<meta property="og:image" content="<https://22000007.fs1.HubSpotusercontent-na1.net/hubfs/22000007/The%20Merits%20of%20Using%20a%20Virtual%20Clinic-OG.jpg>"/>```

Hello All! I am working on setting up a Webhook via Workflows within Django and can't seem to find out why I am receiving Validation issues.
For context, I am simply trying to print out all the info being sent from the HubSpot Workflow.
To give insight into my ViewSet, I am simply using a ViewSet from rest_framework.viewsets and trying to just return "request.body". When I try to do this, I am retrieving this error below when clicking "Test".
